about_the_game:
Welcome to TRAUMA Pro Wrestling, a promotion that doesn't kiss ass, nor draw money! Your road to stardom begins today, here's what we got in store for you!

-14 different match types, each customizable with steel cages, electric barbed wire & more!

-A deep Career mode in which you can become a dastardly heel, a beloved babyface, or a mix of both!

-A character editor that allows you to create your dream superstar from head to toe!

-Complete control over the game's rules, physics and AI to guarantee replayability and experimentation!

-Over 20 wrestlers and 10 arenas to choose from!

Since you were wearing diapers and it's always been your dream to compete in one of our rings, so there you go! Now it's your chance to prove your worth!
Don't be afraid to take shortcuts, especially if in the form of heavy drugs, and always remember that if your gimmick doesn't work for you, brother, you can persuade the bookers to change it.

...Cash only, thanks.

TRAUMA Pro Wrestling, AVAILABLE NOW!

name: TRAUMA Pro Wrestling

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 12th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-12400
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 12th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-12400
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660

short_description: Welcome to TRAUMA Pro Wrestling, a promotion that doesn't kiss ass, nor draw money! Your road to stardom begins today, take a look at what we got in store for you!
